items.title: Boeing (BA) Declines More Than Market: Some Information for Investors
items.description: Boeing (BA) closed at $197.68 in the latest trading session, marking a -1.29% move from the prior day.

items.title: Boeing 737 MAX victims' relatives ask judge to reject deal ending criminal case
items.description: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -Relatives of some of the 346 people killed in two Boeing 737 MAX crashes in 2018 and 2019 asked a federal judge on Wednesday to reject a deal between the Justice Department and the planemaker that allows the company to avoid prosecution in a criminal fraud case.  The agreement enables Boeing to avoid being branded a convicted felon and to escape oversight from an independent monitor for three years that was part of a plea deal struck in 2024.  The families cited Judge Reed O'Connor's statement in 2023 that "Boeing's crime may properly be considered the deadliest corporate crime in U.S. history."

items.title: US safety board wants warnings on Boeing 737 MAX engines over smoke entering cockpit
